alert.note: Alert for Butler; Harvey; Marion; McPherson; Sedgwick (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 8:42AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern McPherson, eastern Sedgwick, central Harvey, southwestern Butler and southwestern Marion Counties through 915 AM CDT... At 842 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southeast of Mcpherson to near Rose Hill. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wichita, Derby, Newton, Mcpherson, Andover, Park City, Valley Center, Bel Aire, Mulvane, Rose Hill, Hesston, Halstead, North Newton, Moundridge, Douglass, Sedgwick, Benton, Kechi, Eastborough and Goessel. This includes the following highways... Interstate 135 between Mile Markers 3 and 59. Interstate 35 between Mile Markers 44 and 60. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
